movie_description: Summary : Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

movie_description: Summary : Indian army special forces execute a covert operation, avenging the killing of fellow army men at their base by a terrorist group.

movie_description: Summary : When oil is discovered in 1920s Oklahoma under Osage Nation land, the Osage people are murdered one by one - until the FBI steps in to unravel the mystery.

movie_description: Summary : World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, serving during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

movie_description: Summary : In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

movie_description: Summary : A precocious and outspoken Iranian girl grows up during the Islamic Revolution.

movie_description: Summary : The story of Togo, the sled dog who led the 1925 serum run despite being considered too small and weak to lead such an intense race.

movie_description: Summary : 1183 A.D.: King Henry II's three sons all want to inherit the throne, but he won't commit to a choice. When he allows his imprisoned wife Eleanor of Aquitaine out for a Christmas visit, they all variously plot to force him into a decision.

cast: Cast : Burt Lancaster, Alain Delon, Claudia Cardinale, Paolo Stoppa
movie_description: Summary : The Prince of Salina, a noble aristocrat of impeccable integrity, tries to preserve his family and class amid the tumultuous social upheavals of 1860s Sicily.

movie_description: Summary : A widowed father and taxi driver who drives a German reporter from Seoul to Gwangju to cover the 1980 uprising, soon finds himself regretting his decision after being caught in the violence around him.

cast: Cast : Robert Blake, Scott Wilson, John Forsythe, Paul Stewart
movie_description: Summary : Two ex-cons murder a family in a robbery attempt, before going on the run from the authorities. The police try to piece together the details of the murder in an attempt to track down the killers.

movie_description: Summary : A petty thief with an utter resemblance to a samurai warlord is hired as the lord's double. When the warlord later dies the thief is forced to take up arms in his place.

directors: Director : George P. Cosmatos, Kevin Jarre

movie_description: Summary : A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

movie_description: Summary : Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Commonwealth and Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

movie_description: Summary : In the 16th century, the ruthless and insane Don Lope de Aguirre leads a Spanish expedition in search of El Dorado.

cast: Cast : Bill Nighy, Imelda Staunton, Dominic West, Paddy Considine
movie_description: Summary : U.K. gay activists work to help miners during their lengthy strike of the National Union of Mineworkers in the summer of 1984.

cast: Cast : Jim Caviezel, Mira Sorvino, Bill Camp, Cristal Aparicio
movie_description: Summary : The incredible true story of a former government agent turned vigilante who embarks on a dangerous mission to rescue hundreds of children from traffickers.

cast: Cast : Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor, Tom Sizemore, Eric Bana
movie_description: Summary : The story of 160 elite U.S. soldiers who dropped into Mogadishu in October 1993 to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord, but found themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily armed Somalis.

movie_description: Summary : NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.

movie_name: Title : A Man for All Seasons

movie_description: Summary : The story of Sir Thomas More, who stood up to King Henry VIII when the King rejected the Roman Catholic Church to obtain a divorce and remarry.
